rule:
Each

tag in the output must not contain any tags.
input: Technology influences education. Online courses are prevalent. Remote learning is growing.
output:
```html

Technology influences education.

Online courses are prevalent.

Remote learning is growing.

Technology influences education again.

Online courses remain prevalent.

Remote learning continues to grow.

```
evaluation:
The output contains six

tags, each wrapping a single sentence which adheres to the requirement of having at least three

tags. Each

tag includes one tag and multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases in accordance with the description. There are no violations of the provided description. No violation. OK
